ENGLISH: You can gather your court and vassals to head out and bring Merry Christmas to the Realm.
You are nearly ready for your Merry caroling through the realm, save for invites and provisions. How many are you wishing to join you in the endeavor?
[From.GetBestName] has called upon you to join in a Great Caroling through the Realm.
[From.GetBestName] has declined your call for a Caroling.

Your vassals who joined you for this great caroling have decided to end the festivities with a snowball fight followed by a round of hot mead at your provision. It seems a memorable event for everyone involved.

You and all the others who join [FromFrom.GetBestName] have a joyous time on the Caroling and as the festivities draw to a close, someone hurls a snowball that hits you in the face. Soon everyone joins in followed by a round of hot mead from [FromFrom.GetBestName]'s stock.
My face still hurts from the snowball...
